name: Zucchini Noodles with Turkey
steps:
Spiralize zucchinis into noodles.
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook garlic for 1 minute.
Add ground turkey and cook until browned.
Add marinara sauce and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add zucchini noodles and cook for 2-3 minutes until tender.
Top with parmesan cheese and fresh basil.
Serve immediately.
